definitions.definition: In an excruciating manner or to an excruciating degree ; in a manner causing great anguish or pain .
examples: The gunshot wound was excruciatingly painful.

definitions.definition: In a very intense or extreme manner.

main_definition: In an excruciating manner or to an excruciating degree ; in a manner causing great anguish or pain .
secondary_definitions: In a very intense or extreme manner.
